pages.text: The $(thing)solar engine$() does not burn items, but requires exposure to the sun. The engine will move the boat at $(6)0.04 * $(italics)Imposed Speed$() blocks / tick$(), where $(italics)Imposed Speed$() is the speed set inside the menu.$(br2)$(bold)$(underline)Note$()$(): By shift-right-clicking the boat, the sensor can be inverted to use moonlight instead of sunlight.
